snippet: Judi Henderson-Townsend has been selling, renting and recycling mannequins for nearly 15 years. This year, she hopes to achieve an elusive goal, cracking a million dollars in revenue.
abstract: Judi Henderson-Townsend has been selling, renting and recycling mannequins for nearly 15 years. This year, she hopes to achieve an elusive goal, cracking a million dollars in revenue.

headline.main: Turning Body Parts — Mannequin Body Parts — Into a Business
